Please give an example of what your controls do now and what you mean by reversed. What kind of drive train do you have, for example, swerve, tank.

here is are code

we have been having problems with are steering reversing so are coach want as to make it so we can just push a button to revers it back

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":15,"updated_at":"2023-03-18T16:11:51.516Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":111,"readers_count":110,"score":32.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":430750,"topic_slug":"we-are-trying-to-make-a-button-input-that-will-reverse-are-controls","display_username":"Evan","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://github.com/Blaze0303/Team4549-2023/tree/main/src/main","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Team4549-2023/src/main at main · Blaze0303/Team4549-2023 · GitHub","clicks":5}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":24594,"username":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","name":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/slab-mr.thomas/{size}/182153_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":57815,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/we-are-trying-to-make-a-button-input-that-will-reverse-are-controls/430750/4","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3167402,"name":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","username":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/slab-mr.thomas/{size}/182153_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-18T16:15:52.680Z","cooked":"

Are you meaning the joystick movement is reversed sometimes from the directions you want? You start driving the robot with pushing left stick more than right stick makes the robot go right but then later suddenly for unknown reasons the robot goes left for the same joystick input?

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":15,"updated_at":"2023-03-18T16:15:52.680Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":103,"readers_count":102,"score":25.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":430750,"topic_slug":"we-are-trying-to-make-a-button-input-that-will-reverse-are-controls","display_username":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":57815,"username":"Blaze0905","name":"Evan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/b/57b2e6/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":24594,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/we-are-trying-to-make-a-button-input-that-will-reverse-are-controls/430750/5","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3167410,"name":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","username":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/slab-mr.thomas/{size}/182153_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-18T16:25:33.141Z","cooked":"

Or maybe you are meaning the robot goes forward but later suddenly it goes backward for the same joystick movement?

You can define a new default command to replace this one with a button say onTrue.

m_drive.setDefaultCommand(
      m_drive.arcadeDriveCommand(()-> 0.75 * m_driverController.getLeftY(), ()-> 0.75 * m_driverController.getLeftX())
    );

but that seems to me putting a tiny bandage on a huge wound. It’s better to spend some time troubleshooting the root cause.

Yes something like that

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":15,"updated_at":"2023-03-18T16:25:43.353Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":90,"readers_count":89,"score":23.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":430750,"topic_slug":"we-are-trying-to-make-a-button-input-that-will-reverse-are-controls","display_username":"Evan","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":57815,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/we-are-trying-to-make-a-button-input-that-will-reverse-are-controls/430750/7","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3167413,"name":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","username":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/slab-mr.thomas/{size}/182153_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-18T16:30:54.625Z","cooked":"

You can make a new method in your m_drive object that sets a new default command. Run the method if a button is onTrue. But this seems so wrong that I feel badly helping you this way. try to figure out what the joystick is doing when the problem starts. Log lots of values of everything you can think of. Try to define what motors or sticks are reversed suddenly.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":15,"updated_at":"2023-03-18T16:30:54.625Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":7,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":83,"readers_count":82,"score":21.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":430750,"topic_slug":"we-are-trying-to-make-a-button-input-that-will-reverse-are-controls","display_username":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":57815,"username":"Blaze0905","name":"Evan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/b/57b2e6/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":24594,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/we-are-trying-to-make-a-button-input-that-will-reverse-are-controls/430750/8","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3167414,"name":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","username":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/slab-mr.thomas/{size}/182153_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-18T16:34:24.949Z","cooked":"

If you have multiple motors on each side maybe one (or more) of them is failing to respond properly. That’s an easy one to figure out by disconnecting/connecting motors and see if the problem goes away or returns. What triggers the incorrect steering? Bumping into something? Going fast?

We just put on a new belly pan and to do that we disconnected everything and are still puting them back on but it was running fine are coach just want a safe guard set up because at are previous competition at turtle trials
It reversed

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":15,"updated_at":"2023-03-18T16:45:40.668Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":73,"readers_count":72,"score":24.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":430750,"topic_slug":"we-are-trying-to-make-a-button-input-that-will-reverse-are-controls","display_username":"Evan","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":57815,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/we-are-trying-to-make-a-button-input-that-will-reverse-are-controls/430750/10","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3167419,"name":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","username":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/slab-mr.thomas/{size}/182153_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-18T16:49:37.158Z","cooked":"

Make sure all your electrical connections are tight and do hard driver practice to shake out other problems. Good Luck on the rest of your season.

","post_number":12,"post_type":1,"posts_count":15,"updated_at":"2023-03-18T16:50:37.806Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":64,"readers_count":63,"score":12.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":430750,"topic_slug":"we-are-trying-to-make-a-button-input-that-will-reverse-are-controls","display_username":"Evan","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":57815,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/we-are-trying-to-make-a-button-input-that-will-reverse-are-controls/430750/12","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3167441,"name":"Gavin Matthews","username":"bovlb","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/bovlb/{size}/167232_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-18T17:37:17.384Z","cooked":"

I thought at first you were asking for code that would flip which side of the robot was front and back. Our drivers ask for this, using the throttle switch on the joystick. If you share your code, I can suggest how to add this.

But it sounds like you want to correct unexpected reversal. I think you need to find what’s causing the underlying problem.

Please check that you’re using v23.1 of DriverStation. There was a fix for a bug where joystick axes could be mis-assigned.

Also, ensure that the joystick is centred when you plug it in or start DriverStation. It zeros on the initial input.

One thing I see is that your robot is driving “backwards” in teleop. Joystick input is backwards from what you might expect.

  • Y on the stick is negative when pushed upward, so Y need to be inverted. You want to apply positive power to the motors to make the robot go forward.
  • X on the stick is positive when pushed to the right. However, rotation in frc is counter-clockwise positive, so X also has to be inverted.
